00035 #ifndef __included_darray_h
00036 #define __included_darray_h
00037 
00038 #    include "core_deprecate.h"
00039 #    include "darray.h"
00040 #    include "dstack.h"
00041 
00042 namespace CrissCross
00043 {
00044     namespace Data
00045     {
00046         template < class T > class DArray
00047         {
00048 
00049           private:
00050             DStack<int>    *empty_nodes;
00051 
00052           protected:
00053 
00054             int            m_stepSize;
00055             int            m_arraySize;
00056 
00057             T            *m_array;
00058             char        *m_shadow;                //0=not used, 1=used
00059 
00060           public:
00061 
00062             DArray ();                // using the default constructor defeats the 
00063             // purpose of the stack. use the other one any time possible.
00064             DArray ( int newstepsize );
00065 
00066             ~DArray ();
00067 
00068             void Grow ();
00069             void SetSize ( int newsize );
00070             void SetStepSize ( int newstepsize );
00071 
00072             int PutData ( const T & newdata );    // Returns index used
00073             void PutData ( const T & newdata, int index );
00074             T GetData ( int index );
00075             void ChangeData ( const T & newdata, int index );
00076             void RemoveData ( int index );
00077             int FindData ( const T & data );    // -1 means 'not found'
00078 
00079             int NumUsed ();            // Returns the number of used entries
00080             int Size ();    // Returns the total size of the array
00081 
00082             bool ValidIndex ( int index );    // Returns true if the index contains used data
00083 
00084             void Empty ();            // Resets the array to empty    
00085 
00086             T & operator []( int index );
00087 
00088         };
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 #    include "darray.cpp"
